unnormalised: ## Music Streaming: Your Pocket-Sized Concert Hall
normalised: Hey everyone! So, remember those days of painstakingly downloading songs off the internet, praying your connection did not cut out halfway through? Or hoarding C D s like they were gold ingots? Those days are officially ancient history, thanks to the magical world of music streaming!

normalised: Seriously, music streaming services have revolutionized how we consume music in India. It is like having a permanent concert hall in your pocket, accessible anytime, anywhere.
